title: Robot Classes
description: Write out your own formal Robot classes

tests.name: A conversation
tests.description_html: Write out a simple conversation between two robots.

checks.error_html: We expected first line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: Hello ⚡☂♞✿☯." but it was "%actual%".
We expected second line of the first conversation to be: "Nicole: Hello ✦☀♻❄☘." but it was "%actual%".

checks.value: Jeremy: I am 10 years old. How old are you?
checks.error_html: We expected third line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: I am 10 years old. How old are you?" but it was "%actual%".

checks.value: Nicole: I am 13. Together we are 23 years old. Wow.
checks.error_html: We expected fourth line of the first conversation to be: "Nicole: I am 13. Together we are 23 years old. Wow." but it was "%actual%".
We expected fifth line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: Wow." but it was "%actual%".
We expected sixth line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: ★⚔♠✧❀." but it was "%actual%".
We expected seventh line of the first conversation to be: "Nicole: Goodbye ♜⚙❖☾✺." but it was "%actual%".
We expected first line of the second conversation to be: "Sam: Hello ⚡☂♞✿☯." but it was "%actual%".
We expected second line of the second conversation to be: "Jeremy: Hello ✦☀♻❄☘." but it was "%actual%".
We expected third line of the second conversation to be: "Sam: Who was that?" but it was "%actual%".
We expected fourth line of the second conversation to be: "Jeremy: That was Nicole." but it was "%actual%".
We expected fifth line of the first conversation to be: "Sam: ★⚔♠✧❀." but it was "%actual%".
We expected sixth line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: Goodbye ♜⚙❖☾✺." but it was "%actual%".

tests.name: Adult Robots
tests.description_html: Write out the same conversation with adults

checks.error_html: We expected first line of the first conversation to be: "Sam: Hello ⚡☂♞✿☯." but it was "%actual%".
We expected second line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: Hello ✦☀♻❄☘." but it was "%actual%".

checks.value: Sam: I am 40 years old. How old are you?
checks.error_html: We expected third line of the first conversation to be: "Sam: I am 40 years old. How old are you?" but it was "%actual%".

checks.value: Jeremy: I am 41. Together we are 81 years old. Wow.
checks.error_html: We expected fourth line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: I am 41. Together we are 81 years old. Wow." but it was "%actual%".
We expected fifth line of the first conversation to be: "Sam: Wow." but it was "%actual%".
We expected sixth line of the first conversation to be: "Sam: Goodbye ★⚔♠✧❀." but it was "%actual%".
We expected seventh line of the first conversation to be: "Jeremy: Goodbye ♜⚙❖☾✺." but it was "%actual%".
We expected first line of the second conversation to be: "Nicole: Hello ⚡☂♞✿☯." but it was "%actual%".
We expected second line of the second conversation to be: "Sam: Hello ✦☀♻❄☘." but it was "%actual%".
We expected third line of the second conversation to be: "Nicole: Who was that?" but it was "%actual%".
We expected fourth line of the second conversation to be: "Sam: That was Jeremy." but it was "%actual%".
We expected fifth line of the first conversation to be: "Nicole: Goodbye ★⚔♠✧❀." but it was "%actual%".
We expected sixth line of the first conversation to be: "Sam: Goodbye ♜⚙❖☾✺." but it was "%actual%".
We expected the vibrate_air function to once appear once on your code.
